meanings.definition: To have a strong desire or craving for food.
meanings.sent1: After playing outside all day, the children hungered for a delicious dinner.
meanings.sent2: The smell of freshly baked cookies made me hunger for a sweet treat.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon character's eyes hungered for the giant sandwich on the screen.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes hungered for success, driving her to work hard every day.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the sizzling steak made my stomach hunger for a bite.

meanings.sent1: The lonely puppy hungered for companionship and wagged its tail at every passerby.
meanings.sent2: As the sun set, the traveler hungered for the comfort of home.
meanings.sent3: The student hungered for knowledge and spent hours in the library every day.
meanings.sent4: His heart hungered for adventure, pushing him to explore new places.
meanings.sent5: The artist hungered for inspiration, staring at the blank canvas in search of ideas.
